thread.title: Zicix Corporation Adds New Board Member

author: cnbc.com
title: Zicix Corporation Adds New Board Member

organizations.name: department of electrical and computer engineering
associate dean of engineering for international programs

text:
CARSON CITY, Nev., March 15, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via OTC PR WIRE– Zicix Corporation (OTC:ZICX) has today announced that Dr. Ramiro Jordan, Associate Dean for International Programs, ECE Department, University of New Mexico, Albuquerque, New Mexico, has been appointed to the company’s board of directors effective March 12, 2018.
“I am pleased that Dr. Jordan accepted our invitation to join our board and look forward to his sharing his knowledge and perspectives with us,” said William Petty, President and Chairman. “I’ve known and worked with Ramiro on multiple international projects since 2005. His knowledge of finance and business development strategy will be invaluable to Zicix as we prepare to enter new and innovative sectors of both consumer marketing and financial services fields.”
Dr. Jordan presently serves the University of New Mexico, Albuquerque as Professor and Associate Dean of Engineering for International Programs, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering. Current areas of research and development include wireless communications, software defined radios and networks, cognitive radios, multi-dimensional digital signal processing (Signals, Image and Machine Learning), and engineering education.
About Zicix Corporation (OTC:ZICX) . Originally founded as a service provider to the Healthcare industry, the Zicix Corporation has recently been restructured with the intention of acquiring and developing technology applications designed for service companies in consumer, retail and other industries.
